column4: anyone want to send me a hoary release CD express mail for a few bucks paypal?
otherwise i order one off ebay, and it took like a week last time :0/
who was it here i was talking to about the "Brown screen" problem the other day?

dunno... but that happens when all of your processes don't go away after you quit your X session... do a ps aux | grep `whoami` at the command prompt to see what you're still running and kill those tasks (with a -9 signal if necessary)
no, it happens before i start X the first time
it was my sound... guess the driver wasn't fulled supporting... kill esd allowed gnome to startup
i should get a forum accound and post taht
bummer... i bet it will time out eventually  but it shouldn't block.
agreed, but 5 minutes is too long to wait :)
it was a big problem, few threads on the forums
that's why i told his DSL
it's a fun little distro
i'm wanting to setup a PC with no moving parts running it now
for no moving parts leaf is a great choice...
you mean your unck just gave you a computer
true, depends on what he wants to do :)
he got a new one... and this one looks old and has win 98 ;-)
he has a P4 hyperthreaded now and thinks its so cool :) he just wanted me to get his stuff off his old one and a few bucks :)
one of the CD drives is a bit flakey, but i think it was a good deal :)
i had someone give me a XP 1800/128mb/20gig with a non-functional ME install... system was fine :)
i seem to have good luck in that department
